meanings.definition: A unit of acceleration equal to the acceleration of gravity.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster accelerated with many gees.
meanings.sent2: The rocket experienced several gees during liftoff.
meanings.sent3: The car went so fast, it felt like it was being pushed by gees!
meanings.sent4: The athlete felt the gees as they sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The gees on the spaceship made the astronaut feel weightless.

meanings.sent1: Gees! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Gees, I can't believe we won the game!
meanings.sent3: Gees, that was a close call on the last play!
meanings.sent4: Her performance left the audience saying gees in awe.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display elicited gees from the crowd.

meanings.sent1: She gees her teammates to give their best effort.
meanings.sent2: The coach gees the players to push through the tough times.
meanings.sent3: He gees his friends to join him on the adventure.
meanings.sent4: The crowd's cheers geed the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The motivational speaker gees the audience to pursue their dreams.
